name: Sobek
title: Sobek - Crocodile God | Egyptian Mythology
subtitle: God of the Nile, Crocodiles, and Fertility
shortDescription: Sobek is the crocodile god of the Nile, military prowess, and fertility. Fierce protector and symbol of pharaonic power . Associated with both creation (emerged from primordial waters) and danger (crocodiles in the Nile). Sometimes considered son of Neith . Crocodiles were kept in sacred pools at his temples.
longDescription: Full detailed mythology and worship information coming soon. For now, see related deities and use the corpus search to explore ancient texts mentioning Sobek .
